attributes.action: Make an immediate U- Turn on the Tax Banding Policies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The taxation banding "Green Tax" is a stealth tax of which will cause chaos amongst motorists.

The price of second hand cars will plumet, the owners of the cars will be left with cars they cannot afford to run and which no one wants to buy.

Working Class workers are targets of an unfair system, you are trying to force people to buy new cars when they cannot afford one, thus worsening the credit problems already faced by millions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
